column4:
['Tumhare bin hum adhure', '
Hamare bin tum adhure', '
Milo aise ki poore ho jaye', '
Lipati ho pedo se bele', '
Chalo hum aise khele', '
Pyar ke sapno main', '
Chalo kho jaye', '
Pehli raat sone ki', '
Baato mein na khone ki', '
Pehli raat sone ki', '
Baato mein na khone ki', '
Haye tumhare bin hum adhure', '
Hamare bin tum adhure', '
Milo aise ki poore ho jaye', 'Ruthe arma hamare rahe', '
Dulhan banke kuware rahe', '
Arey roothe arma hamare rahe', '
Dulhan banke kuware rahe', '
Na giri baliya na hansi chudiya', '
Abhi kajal bhi fela nahin', '
O ho jao na', '
Pehli rat sone ki', '
Bato main na khone ki', '
Tumhare bin hum adhure', '
Hamare bin tum adhure', '
Milo aise ki pure ho jaye', 'Janu mujhse na tum bhagna', '
Sona sath mere jagna', '
Arey janu mujhse', '
Na tum bhagna', '
Sona saath mere jagna', '
Isme kya sharam hain', '
Pati ka dharam hain', '
Mujhe alingan mein', '
Bhad lo ho besharam', '
Pehli raat sone ki', '
Baato main na khone ki', '
Tumhare bin hum adhure', '
Hamare bin tum adhure', '
Milo aise ki pure ho jaye', '
Lipati ho pedo se bele', '
Chalo hum aise khele', '
Pyar ke sapno mein', '
Chalo kho jaye.']
